question: What happens when mammals raise their hair with tiny muscles in the skin?

nodes.text: Bleeding does not happen when mammals raise their hair with tiny muscles in the skin.
Balding does not happen when mammals raise their hair with tiny muscles in the skin.
Bruising happens when mammals raise their hair with tiny muscles in the skin.
Goosebumps happen when mammals raise their hair with tiny muscles in the skin.
